mapper.select: SELECT Q.QRN, Q.QNA_NO, Q.MEMBER_ID, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.QNA_CREATED, Q.QNA_STATE, Q.QNA_DEPTH, Q.QNA_GROUP_NO, Q.QNA_GROUP_ORD FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QNA_CREATED) AS QRN, QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_CREATED, QNA_STATE, QNA_DEPTH, QNA_GROUP_NO, QNA_GROUP_ORD FROM QNA) Q WHERE Q.QRN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_CREATED, QNA_STATE, QNA_DEPTH, QNA_GROUP_NO, QNA_GROUP_ORD) VALUES (QNA_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{qnaTitle},#{qnaContent}, SYSDATE, 1, 0, QNA_NO_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0)
